document.id: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04717
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE AMENDING SECTIONS 4.96.030 AND 4.96.140 OF CHAPTER 4.96 OF TITLE 4 OF THE SAN MATEO COUNTY ORDINANCE CODE TO (1) ADD THE DEFINITION OF “SMOKE”, (2) TO AMEND THE DEFINITIONS OF “SMOKING” AND “TOBACCO PRODUCT” TO INCLUDE ELECTRONIC CIGARETTES AND OTHER PRODUCTS, (3) TO AMEND DEFINITIONS OF MULTI-UNIT RESIDENCES AND MULTI-UNIT RESIDENCE COMMON AREAS, (4) TO AMEND VARIOUS SECTIONS OF CHAPTER 4.96 TO PROVIDE FOR ENFORCEMENT BY HEALTH SYSTEM CHIEF OR DESIGNEES, AND (5) TO AMEND SECTION 4.98.100 OF CHAPTER 4.98 TO ADD DEFINITIONS OF “TOBACCO” AND “TOBACCO PRODUCTS”

citations.citation: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04717
